lines.text: let r be a integer with r = 1
while r * 5 is less than n
let names be a array of strings with elements as Sheldon , Leonard , Penny , Rajesh , Howard
lines.code: string names [ ] = { " Sheldon " , " Leonard " , " Penny " , " Rajesh " , " Howard " } ;

lines.text: print names [ ( n - 1 ) / r ] and newline
